data.detailed_description:
CHECK OUT OTHER YURI GAMES

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1829850/Crystal_Tales_Tactics_Echoes_of_the_Libertas_War/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1851470/Ikkarus_and_the_Prince_of_Sin/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1542710/Dreams_of_an_Exile/


About the Game

Bianca's father is a myth buster who is always traveling to solve the most unexpected cases. One day, he leaves on a mission and Bianca decides to go through his things. She finds a strange cell phone and uses it to take pictures everywhere. What could be a normal experience turns upside down when she notices something weird: the pictures show fantastic beings like demons, ghosts, and angels.

Instead of being frightened, Bianca thinks that is incredible! But she is the only one who thinks like that. The creatures hate to have their photos taken and will do everything to make Bianca delete them, including spending a week pretending to be her best friend. Will they convince Bianca? Could Bianca find true love during a 'week friendship'? Time to discover it by playing a cute yuri furry novel about girls and love.

ðŸ’› A short and cute yuri story with romantic scenes;
ðŸ’› Lots of cute furry CG-art;
ðŸ’› 2 datable girls;
ðŸ’› Multiple endings;
ðŸ’› Duration: 2-3 hours;
ðŸ’› Steam Achievements (different complexities to unlock them);

data.short_description: A cute Furry yuri visual novel about a rabbit who can fall in love with fantastic beings.
data.supported_languages: English, German, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Traditional Chinese

  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 Capable GPU
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
